General.Name: Plant Advanced Technologies SA
General.Description: Plant Advanced Technologies SA, a plant biotechnology company, produces and sells actives for cosmetic, pharmaceutical, and agrochemical markets in France. Its technologies include PAT Plant Milking that produces active extracts through plant stimulation and living-root exudation while preserving plants; and PAT Target Binding, which finds the ligands that bind to the protein targets of interest, such as enzymes. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Vand"uvre-lès-Nancy, France.
General.Address: 19 Avenue de la forEt de Haye, Vand?uvre-lès-Nancy, France, 54500
